<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension"></a>

# EditorExportPlatformExtension

**Inherits:** [EditorExportPlatform](EditorExportPlatform.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Base class for custom [EditorExportPlatform](EditorExportPlatform.md) implementations (plugins).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

External [EditorExportPlatform](EditorExportPlatform.md) implementations should inherit from this class.

To use [EditorExportPlatform](EditorExportPlatform.md), register it using the [EditorPlugin.add_export_platform()](EditorPlugin.md#EditorPlugin_method_add_export_platform) method first.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__can_export"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_can_export**\ (\ preset\: [EditorExportPreset](EditorExportPreset.md), debug\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__can_export)

Returns ``true``, if specified `preset` is valid and can be exported. Use [set_config_error()](EditorExportPlatformExtension.md#EditorExportPlatformExtension_method_set_config_error) and [set_config_missing_templates()](EditorExportPlatformExtension.md#EditorExportPlatformExtension_method_set_config_missing_templates) to set error details.

Usual implementation can call [_has_valid_export_configuration()](EditorExportPlatformExtension.md#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__has_valid_export_configuration) and [_has_valid_project_configuration()](EditorExportPlatformExtension.md#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__has_valid_project_configuration) to determine if export is possible.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__cleanup"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_cleanup**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__cleanup)

Called by the editor before platform is unregistered.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__export_pack"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **_export_pack**\ (\ preset\: [EditorExportPreset](EditorExportPreset.md), debug\: [bool](bool.md), path\: [String](String.md), flags\: **BitField**\[[DebugFlags](EditorExportPlatform.md#enum_EditorExportPlatform_DebugFlags)\]\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__export_pack)

Creates a PCK archive at `path` for the specified `preset`.

This method is called when "Export PCK/ZIP" button is pressed in the export dialog, with "Export as Patch" disabled, and PCK is selected as a file type.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__export_pack_patch"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **_export_pack_patch**\ (\ preset\: [EditorExportPreset](EditorExportPreset.md), debug\: [bool](bool.md), path\: [String](String.md), patches\: [PackedStringArray](PackedStringArray.md), flags\: **BitField**\[[DebugFlags](EditorExportPlatform.md#enum_EditorExportPlatform_DebugFlags)\]\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__export_pack_patch)

Creates a patch PCK archive at `path` for the specified `preset`, containing only the files that have changed since the last patch.

This method is called when "Export PCK/ZIP" button is pressed in the export dialog, with "Export as Patch" enabled, and PCK is selected as a file type.

\ **Note:** The patches provided in `patches` have already been loaded when this method is called and are merely provided as context. When empty the patches defined in the export preset have been loaded instead.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__export_project"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **_export_project**\ (\ preset\: [EditorExportPreset](EditorExportPreset.md), debug\: [bool](bool.md), path\: [String](String.md), flags\: **BitField**\[[DebugFlags](EditorExportPlatform.md#enum_EditorExportPlatform_DebugFlags)\]\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__export_project)

Creates a full project at `path` for the specified `preset`.

This method is called when "Export" button is pressed in the export dialog.

This method implementation can call [EditorExportPlatform.save_pack()](EditorExportPlatform.md#EditorExportPlatform_method_save_pack) or [EditorExportPlatform.save_zip()](EditorExportPlatform.md#EditorExportPlatform_method_save_zip) to use default PCK/ZIP export process, or calls [EditorExportPlatform.export_project_files()](EditorExportPlatform.md#EditorExportPlatform_method_export_project_files) and implement custom callback for processing each exported file.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__export_zip"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **_export_zip**\ (\ preset\: [EditorExportPreset](EditorExportPreset.md), debug\: [bool](bool.md), path\: [String](String.md), flags\: **BitField**\[[DebugFlags](EditorExportPlatform.md#enum_EditorExportPlatform_DebugFlags)\]\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__export_zip)

Create a ZIP archive at `path` for the specified `preset`.

This method is called when "Export PCK/ZIP" button is pressed in the export dialog, with "Export as Patch" disabled, and ZIP is selected as a file type.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__export_zip_patch"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **_export_zip_patch**\ (\ preset\: [EditorExportPreset](EditorExportPreset.md), debug\: [bool](bool.md), path\: [String](String.md), patches\: [PackedStringArray](PackedStringArray.md), flags\: **BitField**\[[DebugFlags](EditorExportPlatform.md#enum_EditorExportPlatform_DebugFlags)\]\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__export_zip_patch)

Create a ZIP archive at `path` for the specified `preset`, containing only the files that have changed since the last patch.

This method is called when "Export PCK/ZIP" button is pressed in the export dialog, with "Export as Patch" enabled, and ZIP is selected as a file type.

\ **Note:** The patches provided in `patches` have already been loaded when this method is called and are merely provided as context. When empty the patches defined in the export preset have been loaded instead.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__get_binary_extensions"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](PackedStringArray.md) **_get_binary_extensions**\ (\ preset\: [EditorExportPreset](EditorExportPreset.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__get_binary_extensions)

Returns array of supported binary extensions for the full project export.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__get_debug_protocol"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **_get_debug_protocol**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__get_debug_protocol)

Returns protocol used for remote debugging. Default implementation return ``tcp://``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__get_device_architecture"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **_get_device_architecture**\ (\ device\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__get_device_architecture)

Returns device architecture for one-click deploy.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__get_export_option_visibility"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_get_export_option_visibility**\ (\ preset\: [EditorExportPreset](EditorExportPreset.md), option\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__get_export_option_visibility)

Validates `option` and returns visibility for the specified `preset`. Default implementation return ``true`` for all options.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__get_export_option_warning"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **_get_export_option_warning**\ (\ preset\: [EditorExportPreset](EditorExportPreset.md), option\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__get_export_option_warning)

Validates `option` and returns warning message for the specified `preset`. Default implementation return empty string for all options.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__get_export_options"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md)\[[Dictionary](Dictionary.md)\] **_get_export_options**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__get_export_options)

Returns a property list, as an [Array](Array.md) of dictionaries. Each [Dictionary](Dictionary.md) must at least contain the ``name: StringName`` and ``type: Variant.Type`` entries.

Additionally, the following keys are supported:

- ``hint: PropertyHint``\\ 

- ``hint_string: String``\\ 

- ``usage: PropertyUsageFlags``\\ 

- ``class_name: StringName``\\ 

- ``default_value: Variant``, default value of the property.

- ``update_visibility: bool``, if set to ``true``, [_get_export_option_visibility()](EditorExportPlatformExtension.md#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__get_export_option_visibility) is called for each property when this property is changed.

- ``required: bool``, if set to ``true``, this property warnings are critical, and should be resolved to make export possible. This value is a hint for the [_has_valid_export_configuration()](EditorExportPlatformExtension.md#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__has_valid_export_configuration) implementation, and not used by the engine directly.

See also [Object._get_property_list()](Object.md#Object_private_method__get_property_list).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__get_logo"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **_get_logo**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__get_logo)

Returns the platform logo displayed in the export dialog. The logo should be 32Ã—32 pixels, adjusted for the current editor scale (see [EditorInterface.get_editor_scale()](EditorInterface.md#EditorInterface_method_get_editor_scale)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__get_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

Returns export platform name.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__get_option_icon"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **_get_option_icon**\ (\ device\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__get_option_icon)

Returns the item icon for the specified `device` in the one-click deploy menu. The icon should be 16Ã—16 pixels, adjusted for the current editor scale (see [EditorInterface.get_editor_scale()](EditorInterface.md#EditorInterface_method_get_editor_scale)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__has_valid_export_configuration"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_has_valid_export_configuration**\ (\ preset\: [EditorExportPreset](EditorExportPreset.md), debug\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__has_valid_export_configuration)

Returns ``true`` if export configuration is valid.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__has_valid_project_configuration"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_has_valid_project_configuration**\ (\ preset\: [EditorExportPreset](EditorExportPreset.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__has_valid_project_configuration)

Returns ``true`` if project configuration is valid.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__is_executable"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_is_executable**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__is_executable)

Returns ``true`` if specified file is a valid executable (native executable or script) for the target platform.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__poll_export"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_poll_export**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__poll_export)

Returns ``true`` if one-click deploy options are changed and editor interface should be updated.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__run"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **_run**\ (\ preset\: [EditorExportPreset](EditorExportPreset.md), device\: [int](int.md), debug_flags\: **BitField**\[[DebugFlags](EditorExportPlatform.md#enum_EditorExportPlatform_DebugFlags)\]\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__run)

This method is called when `device` one-click deploy menu option is selected.

Implementation should export project to a temporary location, upload and run it on the specific `device`, or perform another action associated with the menu item.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__should_update_export_options"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_should_update_export_options**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__should_update_export_options)

Returns ``true`` if export options list is changed and presets should be updated.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_method_get_config_error"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **get_config_error**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_method_get_config_error)

Returns current configuration error message text. This method should be called only from the [_can_export()](EditorExportPlatformExtension.md#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__can_export), [_has_valid_export_configuration()](EditorExportPlatformExtension.md#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__has_valid_export_configuration), or [_has_valid_project_configuration()](EditorExportPlatformExtension.md#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__has_valid_project_configuration) implementations.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_method_get_config_missing_templates"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **get_config_missing_templates**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_method_get_config_missing_templates)

Returns ``true`` is export templates are missing from the current configuration. This method should be called only from the [_can_export()](EditorExportPlatformExtension.md#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__can_export), [_has_valid_export_configuration()](EditorExportPlatformExtension.md#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__has_valid_export_configuration), or [_has_valid_project_configuration()](EditorExportPlatformExtension.md#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__has_valid_project_configuration) implementations.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_method_set_config_error"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_config_error**\ (\ error_text\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_method_set_config_error)

Sets current configuration error message text. This method should be called only from the [_can_export()](EditorExportPlatformExtension.md#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__can_export), [_has_valid_export_configuration()](EditorExportPlatformExtension.md#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__has_valid_export_configuration), or [_has_valid_project_configuration()](EditorExportPlatformExtension.md#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__has_valid_project_configuration) implementations.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformExtension_method_set_config_missing_templates"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_config_missing_templates**\ (\ missing_templates\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformExtension_method_set_config_missing_templates)

Set to ``true`` is export templates are missing from the current configuration. This method should be called only from the [_can_export()](EditorExportPlatformExtension.md#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__can_export), [_has_valid_export_configuration()](EditorExportPlatformExtension.md#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__has_valid_export_configuration), or [_has_valid_project_configuration()](EditorExportPlatformExtension.md#EditorExportPlatformExtension_private_method__has_valid_project_configuration) implementations.
